title: Beef, Potato and Green Bean/Corn Casserole
directions: Cook the beef with the chopped onions over medium heat until the beef has browned; drain. Pour the soup and half-and-half over the beef; stir until well-mixed. Season with salt and pepper.
Lightly grease your slow cooker. Layer the Tater Tots and the green beans in the bottom of the dish. Pour the soup-and-beef mixture over the top, ensuring that the vegetables are completely covered.
Cover and cook on low for 6 hours. Serve with a sprinkling of French's fried onions on top.
